definitions.text: a relatively permanent inclination to react in a particular way
examples: the set of his mind was obvious

definitions.text: grass for pastures and lawns especially bowling and putting greens
an area of grassland unbounded by fences or hedges
a special way of doing something
examples: he had a bent for it
he had a special knack for getting into trouble
he couldn't get the hang of it

definitions.text: cause (a plastic object) to assume a crooked or angular form
examples: twist the dough into a braid
the strong man could turn an iron bar

definitions.text: bend one's back forward from the waist on down
examples: The young man stooped to pick up the girl's purse

definitions.text: turn from a straight course, fixed direction, or line of interest

examples: bent on going to the theater

definitions.text: used of the back and knees; stooped

examples: a car with a crumpled front end
